data_table.description: The dataset provides data collected for alcohol abuse, dependence (e.g. onset, status at first diagnosis, and presence of maximal symptoms based on information obtained through the Semi-Structured Assessment for the Genetics of Alcoholism (SSAGA) questionnaire), general alcohol consumption, and basic sociodemographic data.

variable.name: age_first_drink
variable.value: Missing the ALC section of the interview

variable.name: age_first_got_drunk
variable.description: Age 1st got drunk - earliest pos. intvw
variable.value: Missing the ALC section of the interview

variable.value: Missing the ALC section of the interview
